legalName.label: Legal name
legalName.value: Kevin Matthew Collier (doing business as “Collier Consulting”)

address.label: Address
address.value: Will be disclosed without delay upon request.

phone.label: Phone number
phone.hours: Support hours: Mon–Fri 10:00–18:00 JST (excl. public holidays)

value.after: for session and package prices (all prices in JPY; fees include the post-session learning summary).

fees.label: Additional fees
fees.value: No shipping or handling fees beyond the listed lesson prices. Administrative cancellation fees apply as stated in the refund policy below. For in-person sessions outside of Shibuya, Tamachi, and Shinagawa, additional transportation charges may apply.

paymentMethods.label: Accepted payment methods
paymentMethods.value: Credit card (processed by Stripe), PayPay, and Cash (in-person lessons only).

paymentPeriod.label: Payment period
paymentPeriod.value: Online lessons: please complete payment within 24 hours of booking to keep your spot (payment link provided by email). In-person lessons: pay online in advance or in cash on the day.

delivery.label: Delivery / service provision timing
delivery.value: Standard sessions (50 minutes) are provided online or in-person at the reserved date and time. Compact sessions (30 minutes) are only provided online at the reserved date and time.

customer.title: Customer requests (non-defective)
customer.body: Single lessons — Cancel >48h before: refund minus a ¥500 cancellation/admin fee (free reschedule also available). Cancel 24–48h before: 50% refund. Cancel within 24h or after the session occurs: no refund. Packages — Refundable within 48 hours of purchase if unused; refund minus a ¥1,000 (4-Pack) or ¥1,500 (8-Pack) cancellation/admin fee. After 48 hours or once any credit is used: non-refundable. No refunds after the validity period ends. Rescheduling is allowed up to 24 hours before start time. One credit is consumed per session held or if you cancel within 24 hours.

defective.title: Defective service / operational issues
defective.body: If a lesson cannot be delivered due to our system or operational failure, contact support and we will provide a full refund or a free make-up session.

discounts.label: Discounts
discounts.value: FIRST20: 20% off your first lesson (available for either standard or compact sessions). Not valid for package purchases. Can only be used once (cannot be used for both standard and compact sessions).

packages.label: Packages (credits)
packages.value: Each credit equals one session of the purchased type and duration (Standard: 50 minutes / Compact: 30 minutes). Schedule sessions anytime within the validity window. 4-Pack: valid 120 days; 8-Pack: valid 240 days. Credits are for the purchaser only and are not transferable.
